sentence.Network_en: Bears ? Don't tell me you won't go just because you're afraid of bears.
sentence.Network_cn: 噢,原来copout是想推脱做某件事,但是理由又很牵强.

entry.def: If you refer to something as a cop-out, you think that it is a way for someone to avoid doing something that they should do.

example.ex: To decline to vote is a cop-out...
example.tran: 拒绝投票就是一种逃避。

example.ex: The film's ending is an unsatisfactory cop-out.
example.tran: 电影回避式的结局让人不满。

means.word_mean: 1. a failure to face some difficulty squarely

auth_sentence.content: To say he was "just" a great teacher is an intellectual copout.
auth_sentence.res_content: To say he was "just" a great teacher is an intellectual copout.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To say he was "just" a great teacher is an intellectual copout.
